class.name: position_controllers/InterruptibleJointTrajectoryController
class.description: The InterruptibleJointTrajectoryController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints, which is interrupted in realtime if a stop / goal condition is reached. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a position interface.
